trans-unit.source: How to Scale a media service
trans-unit.target: How to Scale a media service

trans-unit.source: Learn how to scale Media Services by specifying the number of On-Demand Streaming Reserved Units and Encoding Reserved Units that you would like your account to be provisioned with.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to scale Media Services by specifying the number of On-Demand Streaming Reserved Units and Encoding Reserved Units that you would like your account to be provisioned with.

trans-unit.source: How to Scale a Media Service
trans-unit.target: How to Scale a Media Service

trans-unit.source: You can scale Media Services by specifying the number of Streaming Reserved Units and Encoding Reserved Units that you would like your account to be provisioned with.
trans-unit.target: You can scale Media Services by specifying the number of Streaming Reserved Units and Encoding Reserved Units that you would like your account to be provisioned with.

trans-unit.source: You can also scale your Media Services account by adding storage accounts to it.
trans-unit.target: You can also scale your Media Services account by adding storage accounts to it.

trans-unit.source: Each storage account is limited to 500 TB.
trans-unit.target: Each storage account is limited to 500 TB.

trans-unit.source: To expand your storage beyond the default limitations, you can choose to attach multiple storage accounts to a single Media Services account.
trans-unit.target: To expand your storage beyond the default limitations, you can choose to attach multiple storage accounts to a single Media Services account.

trans-unit.source: This topic links to relevant topics.
trans-unit.target: This topic links to relevant topics.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Scaling streaming units</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Scaling streaming units</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For information about scaling encoding units, see the following Portal and .NET topics.
trans-unit.target: For information about scaling encoding units, see the following Portal and .NET topics.

trans-unit.source: Note that the reserved units are the same for Encoding and Indexing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Note that the reserved units are the same for Encoding and Indexing tasks.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Managing Media Services Assets across Multiple Storage Accounts</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Working with Azure Storage</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Managing Media Services Assets across Multiple Storage Accounts</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Working with Azure Storage</linkText><title></title></link>.
